import json, sys
d = json.load\(sys.stdin\)
files = [t['path'] for t in d.get\('tree', []\) if t['type'] == 'blob']

mem_files = [f for f in files if any\(k in f.lower\(\) for k in ['memory', 'persist', 'state', 'session', 'brain', 'context']\)]
print\('Memory-related files:'\)
for f in mem_files:
    print\(' ', f\)
print\(\)
print\('All top-level dirs:', sorted\(set\(f.split\('/'\)[0] for f in files if '/' in f\)\)\)
" 2>/dev/null)
